Name: Fire
Description: Causes Fire damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Fira
Description: Causes a lot of Fire damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Firaga
Description: Causes big-time Fire damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Sleep
Description: Puts single/multiple targets to sleep.

Name: Blizzard
Description: Causes Ice damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Blizzara
Description: Causes a lot of Ice damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Blizzaga
Description: Causes big-time Ice damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Slow
Description: Slows down ATB Gauge.

Name: Thunder
Description: Causes Thunder damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Thundara
Description: Causes a lot of Thunder damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Thundaga
Description: Causes big-time Thunder damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Stop
Description: Stops targets from taking any action.

Name: Poison
Description: Causes Poison to single/multiple targets.

Name: Bio
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage and Poison to single/multiple targets.

Name: Osmose
Description: Absorbs MP from the target and transfers it to the spell caster.

Name: Drain
Description: Drains HP from the target and transfers it to the spell caster.

Name: Demi
Description: Amount of damage depends on the target's HP.

Name: Comet
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage.

Name: Death
Description: KOs the target.

Name: Break
Description: Causes Petrify.

Name: Water
Description: Causes Water damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Meteor
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to all enemies.

Name: Flare
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage.

Name: Doomsday
Description: Causes Shadow damage to all targets.
